fields.content:
Here's a headline about this story!

There's lots of paragraph styles you can apply to you text. It's worth using them as it breaks up the story into manageable chunks for people to easily digest. Here's a YouTube video…

That was nice, wasn't it. Adding images and, where available, video, about your story, adds real engagement value to your content. You can also add bulleted lists to your content, like this.

  • List point one
  • List point two
  • List point three

There's always three points, aren't there!
fields.title: Our last family event was brilliant!
fields.teaser: The teaser field should consist of a few words, describing what people will see if they click through to the news story its self. Being short and concise is really important.
